headings: Prepare to join the global business community.
Earn a Master’s Degree at the Same Time
What Can You Do With a Degree in International Business?
Why Earn My International Business Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Do you think you might want to get involved in importing and exporting? Maybe you’d like to join a multinational corporation, or you’re interested in how governments and businesses interact for international commerce. If your career interests fall in any of these areas, then a major in international business may be right for you.

In our comprehensive degree program, you’ll take classes in everything from international business, economics and finance - to management, business information systems and political science. You’ll also gain the communication, time-management and technology skills you need to succeed, while also developing a global perspective of business.
Contact Information
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.

You also have the option of applying for our integrated program that allows you to earn your B.B.A. in International Business and yourMaster of Business Administration(MBA) degree in as little as five years.

Our professional faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom and offer a global view of business, economics and finance. Our small class sizes mean you really get to know your professors, and you’ll also have the chance to work with them on high-level research projects.
Business Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

Start your career as soon as you graduate. The ease of international communication and travel, combined with the complexity of the global business community and world economies, is driving an ongoing demand for business professionals with an international perspective.
Our graduates go on to careers as international business specialists, foreign business consultants, global operations managers and web administrators, and in international sales.
Explore Career Possibilities

You can gain a global perspective of various business and financial practices on our annual summer study abroad trip to Europe. You’ll visit cities in nine European countries that host numerous multinational corporations and other international organizations. You’ll also get to visit a variety of historical sites to truly broaden your horizons.

We offer many internship opportunities, and our internship coordinator will help you find the one that is right for you. You can also compete for cash prizes in our student BizPitch Contest, and you can take advantage of the latest in digital technology in our smart classrooms. We also have our own fully-equipped computer lab.

Our chapter of the Delta Sigma Pi national professional business fraternity is one of the most decorated chapters in the nation. Join in for networking and professional development activities, as well as to attend regional and national conferences. You’ll also have access to all the services in ourCenter for Student Successto help you achieve your academic and professional goals.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
